title: Latinas for Trump founder criticizes 'inhumane' immigration arrests
shortDescription: Ileana Garcia, who co-founded Latinas for Trump, criticized Donald Trump’s recent immigration enforcement actions as “unacceptable and inhumane."

title: Army deletes video of tanks over 'Hang Fauci & Bill Gates' graffiti
shortDescription: The Army deleted a video from its social media that showed a tank en route to the June 14 parade on a train car spray-painted with the death threat.

title: Watch: Trump stumbled up the stairs to plane, similar to Biden trip
shortDescription: President Donald Trump was climbing the stairs of Air Force One. The Trump campaign used a video clip of Biden stumbling in multiple camapign ads.

title: What is the Insurrection Act? Here's what Trump has said about invoking it
shortDescription: Trump's National Guard deployment to Los Angeles and recent comments signal more sweeping executive actions are possible. Is the Insurrection Act one of them?

title: Trump appears to stumble on Air Force One steps
shortDescription: President Donald Trump appeared to trip while boarding Air Force One, moments after addressing reporters in Morristown, New Jersey.

title: Protesters respond as Trump's immigration raids disrupt daily life
shortDescription: As President Trump delivers on his promise to deport millions of immigrants, tough, new tactics are being met with growing community resistance.

title: CA officials take on Trump over National Guard
shortDescription: California officials accuse President Donald Trump of inflaming protests by mounting a federal response.

title: What is Trump's current approval rating? See the polls
shortDescription: Presidential approval ratings show Americans' views during each term. See how the latest polls rated Donald Trump and how they compare to past terms.

title: 'We're suing him': California challenges Trump on National Guard order
shortDescription: Authorities swept in with flash-bangs and tear gas grenades to disperse hundreds of protesters in Los Angeles.

title: Bishop attacked by Trump open to meeting over LGBTQ rights
shortDescription: Bishop Mariann Edgar Budde, who urged Donald Trump to have mercy on LGBTQ communities and others, said Pride Month is a time to feel seen and supported

title: What to know about Trump’s military parade: Date, time, route
shortDescription: The June 14 event will feature flyovers, demonstrations, musical performances and fireworks. Here's what to know about attending or watching from home.

title: California governor accuses Trump of 'acts of a dictator'
shortDescription: By calling in the National Guard to quell protests in Los Angeles, Trump is 'inciting and provoking violence,' Newsom says.

title: Trump's travel ban on 12 countries goes into effect early Monday
shortDescription: The travel ban forms part of Trump's policy to restrict immigration into the United States and is reminiscent of a similar move in his first term

title: Incendiary: President Trump's Guard deployment in LA draws ire
shortDescription: President Donald Trump’s order gives 2,000 soldiers the authority to protect federal property like office buildings but no power to arrest civilians.

title: Sanders blasts Trump on 'authoritarianism' for sending troops to LA
shortDescription: Bernie Sanders' comments come after Trump deployed 2,000 National Guard troops to help quell immigration protests in Los Angeles.

title: Trump orders National Guard to LA
shortDescription: President Trump ordered 2,000 National Guard troops to Los Angeles to combat violent protesters opposed to immigration enforcement.

title: Why did Trump deploy National Guard to LA protests? What to know about tense clashes
shortDescription: President Donald Trump orders the National Guard to quell protests against immigration enforcement in Los Angeles.
